title_zh: 第四届Stellar Build Challenge挑战赛结果出炉666
title_en: The results of the fourth Stellar Build Challenge666
summary_zh: Brian 感谢所有参与第四届Stellar Build Challenge（SBC）挑战赛的小伙伴！我们还要感谢所有花费宝贵时间给予我们反馈的社区成员。你们在开发阶段的持续反馈为开发人员完成项目提供了极其重要的帮助。我们的评委查看了40多个参赛作品，最终决定将奖励23位参赛者795万流明币。我们在下面列出了此次获得奖励的参赛作品，也希望这次没能获奖的参赛者能够继续完善自己的项目并参加下一轮比赛。我们2017年的最后一次Stellar Build Challenge将以同样的互动形式进行，参赛者需要在最终提交（日期如下）前公布自己的项目。2017年最后一轮挑战赛主要日期： 10月30日：宣布项目11月15日：最终提交日期获奖名单应用程序类Popcoin Popcoin是以使用为基础的计费服务，将成为最快速最简单的收费方式。Popcoin使用Stellar创建应用并转移和操控代币。PapayaBot PapayaBot是在Telegram应用程序中购买比特币和其他货币的P2P交易市场。Publicstellar Publicstellar允许人们列出或创建自己的资产
summary_en: Brian would like to thank all of you for participating in the 4th Stellar Build Challenge (SBC) Challenge! We also thank all community members who have spent valuable time giving us feedback. Your continuous feedback during the development phase provides developers with extremely important help in completing projects. Our judges reviewed more than 40 entries and decided to reward 23 contestants with 7.95 million lux coins. We list the winning entries below and hope that the contestants who did not win this time can continue to improve their own projects and participate in the next round of competition. Our last Stellar Build Challenge in 2017 will be conducted in the same interactive form. Participants will need to announce their project before final submission (dates below). The final round of the 2017 Challenge Main Date: October 30th: Announcement of the project November 15th: Final submission date Winner list Application class Popcoin Popcoin is a usage-based billing service that will be the fastest and easiest to charge the way. Popcoin uses Stellar to create applications and transfer and manipulate tokens. PapayaBot PapayaBot is a P2P trading market that buys bitcoins and other currencies in the Telegram app. Publicstellar Publicstellar allows people to list or create their own assets

title_zh: 第四届Stellar Build Challenge挑战赛结果出炉555
title_en: The results of the fourth Stellar Build Challenge666
summary_zh: Brian 感谢所有参与第四届Stellar Build Challenge（SBC）挑战赛的小伙伴！我们还要感谢所有花费宝贵时间给予我们反馈的社区成员。你们在开发阶段的持续反馈为开发人员完成项目提供了极其重要的帮助。我们的评委查看了40多个参赛作品，最终决定将奖励23位参赛者795万流明币。我们在下面列出了此次获得奖励的参赛作品，也希望这次没能获奖的参赛者能够继续完善自己的项目并参加下一轮比赛。我们2017年的最后一次Stellar Build Challenge将以同样的互动形式进行，参赛者需要在最终提交（日期如下）前公布自己的项目。2017年最后一轮挑战赛主要日期： 10月30日：宣布项目11月15日：最终提交日期获奖名单应用程序类Popcoin Popcoin是以使用为基础的计费服务，将成为最快速最简单的收费方式。Popcoin使用Stellar创建应用并转移和操控代币。PapayaBot PapayaBot是在Telegram应用程序中购买比特币和其他货币的P2P交易市场。Publicstellar Publicstellar允许人们列出或创建自己的资产
summary_en: Brian would like to thank all of you for participating in the 4th Stellar Build Challenge (SBC) Challenge! We also thank all community members who have spent valuable time giving us feedback. Your continuous feedback during the development phase provides developers with extremely important help in completing projects. Our judges reviewed more than 40 entries and decided to reward 23 contestants with 7.95 million lux coins. We list the winning entries below and hope that the contestants who did not win this time can continue to improve their own projects and participate in the next round of competition. Our last Stellar Build Challenge in 2017 will be conducted in the same interactive form. Participants will need to announce their project before final submission (dates below). The final round of the 2017 Challenge Main Date: October 30th: Announcement of the project November 15th: Final submission date Winner list Application class Popcoin Popcoin is a usage-based billing service that will be the fastest and easiest to charge the way. Popcoin uses Stellar to create applications and transfer and manipulate tokens. PapayaBot PapayaBot is a P2P trading market that buys bitcoins and other currencies in the Telegram app. Publicstellar Publicstellar allows people to list or create their own assets
